text: "It were yesterday afternoon" ( with an appearance of reflection, "I don't expect it to do me any good."

passages.fragment: It were yesterday afternoon '' ( with an appearance of
passages.full_quote: "<used>It were yesterday afternoon" ( with an appearance of</used> mingled wisdom, relief, and strict impartiality )
added Joe, <used>with an appearance of reflection, "w</used>hether it were Joe, or Jorge."
To which I replied, after a long interval <used>of reflection, "I don't</used> know."
